articles.title: Reese Witherspoon selfie with teenage son Deacon has fans gobsmacked at resemblance - 7NEWS.com.au
articles.description: For years, fans have been marvelling at how much Reese Witherspoon looks like her daughter - but it’s a selfie with her 17-year-old son that now has them talking.
articles.content:
The apple doesnt fall far from the tree for Reese Witherspoon and her kids!
